entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: The location where Harry is being introduced to various people and shops.

entities.name: dedalus diggle
entities.description: A person who remembers Harry and is excited to meet him.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard who is being introduced to various people and shops in Diagon Alley.

entities.name: doris crockford
entities.description: A person who keeps coming back for more handshakes with Harry.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts who introduces Professor Quirrell to Harry.

entities.name: professor quirrell
entities.description: One of Harry's teachers at Hogwarts, who is nervous and stuttering.

relationships.description: Doris Crockford shakes hands with Harry Potter repeatedly.
Hagrid introduces Professor Quirrell to Harry.
Professor Quirrell will be one of Harry's teachers at Hogwarts.
